title: Inception
overview: A skilled thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

title: The Dark Knight
overview: Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague the streets. The emergence of the Joker creates chaos in Gotham.

title: Interstellar
overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Avatar
overview: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: Titanic
overview: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Joker
overview: A mentally troubled comedian embarks on a downward spiral that leads to the creation of an iconic villain.

title: The Matrix
overview: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Gladiator
overview: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: Avengers: Endgame
overview: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
